sentences.en: The only problem was slight awkwardness in loading the film.
sentences.cn: 唯一的问题是装胶卷时有点笨拙。

sentences.en: The best solution is to send a light-hearted apology to explain your awkwardness.
sentences.cn: 最好的解决办法是发送一个轻松的道歉来缓解你的尴尬。

sentences.en: In this instance, the best solution is to send a quick apology to explain your awkwardness.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下，最好的解决办法是尽快道歉，以解释你的尴尬。
